item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite closed higher on Tuesday as traders awaited Trump's tariffs. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Wednesday.
